review: We love it. Being a long time Amazon Prime member, now I get to use more benefits beyond free shipping. Good range of content for kids and adults included with Prime membership. I've also reduced my cable service which saves me about $50 per month. The fiber optic connection to my home theater system provides very good 5.1 surround sound. Still learning the User Interface,  but my 8 year old has already mastered it. My only wish is for an in/off control function on the remote control.
